sentences.sContent: Ha! I thought it might be you hiding there!
sentences.sCn: 哈！我想可能就是你藏在那里！

synos.tran: 哈！（表示惊异，愉快，怀疑，胜利等）

trans.tranCn: 哈！（表示惊异，愉快，怀疑，胜利等）
trans.tranOther: used when you are surprised or have discovered something interesting
used when you are surprised or have discovered something interesting
